roleset.name: inhospitible to the growth of life
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-2,3

example.name: arg1
example.text: The life we see around us evolved in this Universe as conditions allowed , so it 's not surprising at all that everything fits nicely . Other Universes with different rules would necessarily have life in them which fits that universe . And Universes which-1 [*-1] are sterile have no life in them to question the fact that they are not there .

example.name: botha rgs
example.text: Re-applying it too often can make the soil sterile to new plant growth.
